Articles.Content:
Hi gang,

Finally sorted out a new laptop to properly play KSP and just had to have a go with some LP.

I'm in the process of uploading 3 videos to YouTube now at http://youtube.com/grahamrutland

They cover initial Science, Lift Off and Orbit. All going well I'll be uploading a little Mun flyby tomorrow and would like to make this a regular thing.

Hope you enjoy

Edited September 13, 2015 by DuoDex
I'll click on them once they pop up

Punted to Fan Works

Trust me to miss that, cheers!

Videos 4 and 5 are now up. Please like, comment and subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/grahamrutland

So far I've covered science, liftoff, orbit, a bit more science and a Mun flyby. Next episode should be a Mun Orbit with Episode 7, hopefully, a Mun landing. These ought to go up tomorrow.

Videos 6 and 7 are up. youtube.com/grahamrutland

This time I make a little field trip to the desert followed by getting into Munar orbit.

I seem to be trucking along at 2 videos a day at the moment, though they're now getting longer as the journeys get greater.

Parts 8 and 9 deal with first orbiting, then landing, on Minimus. Two hours of viewing for your (hopeful) enjoyment!

http://youtube.com/grahamrutland

Me again. Video 10 is up and it's a 90-minute epic as I fly to, land on, and fly back from the Mun.

That's pretty much the prior extent of my KSP knowledge - videos from Ep 11 onwards are going to be me breaking some very new ground.

Video 11 is up and about - this time I use RemoteTech to put a satellite network in geostationary orbit around Kerbin.

youtube.com/grahamrutland
